The prophete Isaye, translated into englysshe, by George Ioye Bible. O.T. Isaiah. English. Joye. Joye, George, d. 1553.
[240] p.
By Balthassar Beckenth [i.e. M. de Keyser], [Printed in Straszburg [i.e. Antwerp] : in the year of our lorde 1531. the .x. daye of Maye] [1531]
Translated by George Joye. Imprint from colophon (as corrected by STC). Signatures: A-P. Copy filmed at reel 2003:3 has leaves A3 and A4 bound and filmed out of order. Reproductions of originals in the Cambridge University Library.
=======
